title: How to Change Your Document Size in Inkscape 1.2

media:group.media:title: How to Change Your Document Size in Inkscape 1.2
media:group.media:description:
In this Inkscape basics tutorial, I show you how to resize your document to any dimensions. You can use the default template sizes, or manually set your own document dimensions with these very simple steps. If you're a total beginner and stuck on how to change the size of your document, this beginner friendly tutorial will help you out!
